name: Table naming convention - character set control (SQL)
description: List of tables that contain characters other than [a-Z,0-9,_]
output:
This report lists all tables names containing characters other than [a-Z,0-9,_]

It provides the following information:

- Table name, 
- Table full name
rationale:
For readability and changeability aspects, naming conventions must be respected.

=> Table name should not contain characters other than [a-Z,0-9,_]
remediation: Change name according to the naming convention
alternativeName: Table naming convention - character set control (SQL)
